## Icon.getIconLocation() method

Returns the center of the block's icon relative to the surface.  Object with x and y properties in workspace coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getIconLocation(): Coordinate | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate \| null
